sourcesContent:
import React, { useMemo } from 'react'; import DashboardLayout from '../components/Layout/DashboardLayout'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { MessageSquare, Rocket, Swords, Trophy, BrainCircuit, CalendarClock, Flame, Sparkles } from 'lucide-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const knowledgeNodes = [ { id: 1, label: 'Vectors', mastery: 0.42, position: 'row-span-2', prerequisites: [2], status: 'weak' }, { id: 2, label: 'Calculus', mastery: 0.76, position: '', prerequisites: [3], status: 'medium' }, { id: 3, label: 'Algebra', mastery: 0.88, position: 'col-span-2', prerequisites: [], status: 'strong' }, { id: 4, label: 'Mechanics', mastery: 0.58, position: '', prerequisites: [3], status: 'medium' }, { id: 5, label: 'Waves', mastery: 0.33, position: '', prerequisites: [4], status: 'weak' } ]; const getMasteryFromModel = (topic) => { // TODO: Replace with GPU-trained GNN model inference once backend is connected return knowledgeNodes.find((node) => node.label === topic)?.mastery ?? 0.5; }; const predictForgetRisk = (topic) => { // TODO: Replace with forgetting prediction model hooked to time-series learner data const mastery = getMasteryFromModel(topic); if (mastery < 0.4) return 'Critical'; if (mastery < 0.7) return 'Moderate'; return 'Low'; }; const StudentDashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const xp = 8420; const level = Math.floor(xp / 100); const syllabusCompletion = 0.68; const streakDays = 14; const revisionPlan = useMemo( () => [ { concept: 'Vectors', mastery: `${Math.round(getMasteryFromModel('Vectors') * 100)}%`, risk: predictForgetRisk('Vectors'), next: 'Today', tag: 'Urgent' }, { concept: 'Mechanics', mastery: `${Math.round(getMasteryFromModel('Mechanics') * 100)}%`, risk: predictForgetRisk('Mechanics'), next: 'Tomorrow', tag: 'Upcoming' }, { concept: 'Calculus', mastery: `${Math.round(getMasteryFromModel('Calculus') * 100)}%`, risk: predictForgetRisk('Calculus'), next: 'Friday', tag: 'Stable' } ], [] ); const progressMomentum = [ { label: 'Concept Mastery', value: 82 }, { label: 'Revision Punctuality', value: 74 }, { label: 'Assessment Confidence', value: 69 } ]; const badges = [ { title: 'Streak Master', description: `${streakDays} day revision streak`, icon: Flame, accent: 'bg-[#fde68a] text-[#92400e]' }, { title: 'Concept Crusher', description: '5 nodes mastered this week', icon: Swords, accent: 'bg-[#c7d2fe] text-[#3730a3]' }, { title: 'Fast Learner', description: 'Average quiz speed +18%', icon: Rocket, accent: 'bg-[#bfdbfe] text-[#1d4ed8]' } ]; const emptyStates = { knowledgeMap: 'No new concepts unlocked this week. Keep exploring to expand your knowledge map.', revisions: 'All revision actions completed. New recommendations appear soon.' }; return (

Personalized learning overview

Welcome back, {user?.name ?? 'Learner'}

Your knowledge graph has evolved overnight. Review the adaptive revision plan and keep the streak alive.

XP {xp.toLocaleString()}
Level {level}
Syllabus completion {Math.round(syllabusCompletion * 100)}%
{[ { label: 'Dashboard', href: '/student' }, { label: 'Knowledge Map', href: '/student/knowledge-map' }, { label: 'Revisions', href: '/student/revisions' }, { label: 'Progress', href: '/student/progress' }, { label: 'Doubts', href: '/student/doubt-support' } ].map((item) => ( {item.label} ))}

Live knowledge map

Nodes glow by mastery. Hover for relationships and recommended actions.

{knowledgeNodes.map((node) => (
{node.label}

{Math.round(node.mastery * 100)}%

Prerequisites: {node.prerequisites.length || 'None'}

{node.status}
))} {!knowledgeNodes.length && (
{emptyStates.knowledgeMap}
)}

Adaptive revision table

AI Generated
{revisionPlan.map((row) => ( ))} {!revisionPlan.length && ( )}
Concept Mastery Forget risk Next revision Tag
{row.concept} {row.mastery} {row.risk} {row.next} {row.tag}
{emptyStates.revisions}

Weakness heatmap

{[33, 41, 56, 68, 82, 45, 27, 74, 59, 91].map((score, index) => (
{score}%
))}
Low mastery High mastery

Gamified progression

XP Counter

{xp.toLocaleString()}

Level

{level}

Mastery streak

{streakDays} days

Progress momentum

{progressMomentum.map((item) => (
{item.label} {item.value}%
))}

Badge cabinet

{badges.map((badge) => (

{badge.title}

{badge.description}

))}

AI-powered doubt solver

Ask a question and the AI mentor replies instantly with contextual examples and follow-up prompts.

Open demo chat
); }; export default StudentDashboard;
